name: Kopparbergs County Household Society Award (Small)
obverse: A woman in classical dress holds a sickle. Her other arm is resting on a shield with a crown and crossed arrows. Behind her are farm tools.
obverse_inscriptions: STORA KOPPARBERGS LÄNS K. HUSHÅLLNINGS SÄLLSKAP.
description: This appears to be a reward medal for a society in Kopparbergs.
This is the version described in Olsen, but a larger variant also exists.
